{"type":"text","timestamp":1771656279593,"sessionID":"ses_3810f365dffevkVHjNMcKCzGac","part":{"id":"prt_c7ef16e5a001XaZde1OT6kdSX6","sessionID":"ses_3810f365dffevkVHjNMcKCzGac","messageID":"msg_c7ef0c9df001R47sTvTYPuT9PD","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# Multi-stage Dockerfile for monorepo with 3 services

# ==================== Go API Server ====================
FROM golang:1.21-alpine AS api-build
WORKDIR /app
COPY api/go.mod api/go.sum ./api/
RUN cd api && go mod download
COPY api/ ./api/
RUN CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -o server ./api/cmd/main.go

FROM alpine:latest AS api
RUN apk --no-cache add ca-certificates
WORKDIR /root/
COPY --from=api-build /app/server .
EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["./server"]

# ==================== React Frontend ====================
FROM node:18-alpine AS frontend-build
WORKDIR /app
COPY frontend/package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --omit=dev
COPY frontend/ ./
RUN npm run build

FROM nginx:alpine AS frontend
COPY --from=frontend-build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

# ==================== Python Celery Worker ====================
FROM python:3.11-slim AS worker
WORKDIR /app
COPY worker/requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY worker/ .
ENV REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379/0
CMD ["celery", "-A", "worker", "worker", "--loglevel=info"]
